# AUGenericViewDisplayFlags

**Structure**

Flags that describe the display of a generic view.

## Declaration

```swift
struct AUGenericViewDisplayFlags
```

## Display Flags

- **viewParametersDisplayFlag**: If set, the generic view displays the audio unit parameters of the audio unit.
- **viewPropertiesDisplayFlag**: If set, the generic view displays the audio unit properties of the audio unit.
- **viewTitleDisplayFlag**: If set, the generic view displays the title and manufacturer of the audio unit.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
